title: Generate a Packing List
description: Before an order is packed, the system must generate a packing list to be included inside the box.

tasks.description: Retrieve the details of the order to be packed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent correctly identifies the order and its contents.

tasks.description: Verify the items and quantities that have been picked for the order.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent confirms the picked items match the order.

tasks.description: Generate and print the packing list document.
tasks.expected_outcome: A packing list is successfully printed, showing the items and quantities being shipped.
